readable.title: 2306186887_0bd8ed3792
readable.content: A brown dog is playing with a red toy while another brown dog bounds towards the camera . The dogs run and play with a red ball . The little brown dogs with floppy ears are playing with a red ball . The two dogs , one holding a ball in its mouth , run through the grass . Two brown dogs are playing on the grass , and one of them is carrying a red ball .
